I always pictured people that are into guro as just really weak people. Like people who feel weak. Guro turns them on because its this power over life trip, or seeing others killed is nice because they are so jealous/resentful of others, especially girls (since they are most likely a spiteful guy who geta very little attention from females.) I used to really hate people who like this shit, but now I just pity them. I really think that if you are at the point where this turns you on, killing yourself is legitimately something to consider. Thing is, people who are into this are also very narcisistic and sociopathic (essentially brats that never grew up), so I would be surprised if they even considered a therapist let alone killing themselves. We at least can all feel a sense of relief that most of them are probably to cowardly to ever attempt any crazy shit.
